system.novice: The Navigator Adds Perception Bonus to first hit each turn with Ranged or Melee attacks to Target(not Navigator Powers) . Lasts 1 Turn + 1 per Degree of Sucecss.
system.adept: Extra damage ignores Armour and Toughness (although rest of the attack is reduced as normal).
system.master: Extra Damage is now 2x Perception Bonus instead of 1x, the Navigators first successful ranged or melee attack (not including Navigator Powers) ignores Forcefields and Psychic Defences.
